channel.title: Need Server Hoster Get Rewards
channel.description: I will make this short and to the point: -I can no longer host servers so I need a hoster -I will lock the source so you wont be able to make changes -I will preset staff accounts for new staff later -I put in an automatic portforwarder so you don't have to do much work -You will get a share of the donations (rsgp) and co owner - IT HAS TO BE 24 / 7! -I will send you the source through team viewer -all you have to do is set up no-ip and run it portforwarding is not needed -any questions comment plz

item.title: Need Server Hoster Get Rewards
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:7, topic:397164”][quote author=Rash link=topic=494316.msg3613700#msg3613700 date=1306802605]

You can’t request here… Request in Development Teams.

YOu can’t request there either…

Hey why are you requesting me to stop requesting? RULE BREAKER

I am not requesting that you stop requesting.
[/quote]

Don’t you just love spamming on dumb people’s posts?[/quote]

I do.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Server Hoster Get Rewards
item.dc:creator: @cerealman149 cerealman149
item.description:
@cerealman149 wrote:

I will make this short and to the point:
-I can no longer host servers so I need a hoster
-I will lock the source so you wont be able to make changes
-I will preset staff accounts for new staff later
-I put in an automatic portforwarder so you don’t have to do much work
-You will get a share of the donations (rsgp) and co owner

  • IT HAS TO BE 24 / 7!
    -I will send you the source through team viewer
    -all you have to do is set up no-ip and run it portforwarding is not needed
    -any questions comment plz

Read full topic
